about_the_game:
Space Grunts is a combination of turn-based tactics and fast paced arcade action.

Navigate your way through procedurally generated space stations, taking out enemies or using the shockwave of your rockets, grenades and other explosions to simply move those enemies out of the way on your path to the end goal.

(Planned) Key features

  • Fast turn-based gameplay (as seen and enjoyed in the original Space Grunts)

  • Tactical weapon usage with weapons having a "spread pattern"

  • Explosive weapons generate shock-waves pushing/forcing entities around the map

  • Procedurally generated

  • Risk reward mission system: Dangerous missions give bigger rewards than easier missions

Space Grunts 3 is currently in "early stages" of development, you can follow it's development on the Orangepixel Youtube channel, where I frequently post update videos and, hop on the Discord where I frequently ask for feedback and show early new features!

  • Processor: 2.0 ghz Dual Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD3000 or higher with OpenGL 2.1 support

short_description: You have an X amount of turns before all hell breaks loose. Gain experience and new items to find ways to prolong the inevitable while you complete missions on board of space ships, moon bases and other mysterious areas in space. One step at a time in this fast paced but turn based roguelike.
